title: Knockout thrills
brief_description: Newsreel footage capturing the closing stages of some historic boxing matches. 1. Gene Tunney versus Georges Capentier (Round 14, 24th of July 1924, Polo Grounds, New York City). 2. Harry Wills versus Paulino Uzcudun (Round 4, 13th of July 1927, Brooklyn, New York City). 3. Jack Dempsey versus Jack Sharkey (Round 6-7, 21st of July 1927, Yankee Stadium, New York City). 4. Joe Louis versus James J. Braddock (Round 7-8, 22nd of June 1937, Chicago).
